name: Astra Activ Fat Spread
description: Astra Activ, the newest member of Astra is made with Sunflower and Canola oils enriched with omega 3 & 6 and 5 Vitamins. Vitamin  A,D,B6,B9 & B12 support your kids normal immunity and Omega 3 & 6 helps your kid's growth and development. Astra Activ is soft in texture, rich in flavor and doesn't contain any artificial flavors or colors. It can be used for any kind of spreading and topping application.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
